    • Method Detail

      • newAppCurator

        public static org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFramework newAppCurator(FluoConfiguration config)
        Creates a curator built using Application's zookeeper connection string. Root path will start at Fluo application chroot.

      • newFluoCurator

        public static org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFramework newFluoCurator(FluoConfiguration config)
        Creates a curator built using Fluo's zookeeper connection string. Root path will start at Fluo chroot.

      • newRootFluoCurator

        public static org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFramework newRootFluoCurator(FluoConfiguration config)
        Creates a curator built using Fluo's zookeeper connection string. Root path will start at root "/" of Zookeeper.

      • newCurator

        Creates a curator built using the given zookeeper connection string and timeout

        Starts the ephemeral node and waits for it to be created
        Parameters:
